main¶

The main DarkHistory function.

Methods

evolve([in_spec_elec, in_spec_phot, …]) Main function computing histories and spectra.
get_elec_cooling_data(eleceng, photeng) Returns electron cooling data for use in main.evolve.
get_tf(rs, xHII, xHeII, dlnz[, coarsen_factor]) Returns the interpolated transfer functions.
